attributes.action: You can’t extend the route to Indefinite Leave to Remain to 10 years and simult…
attributes.additional_details: Abandon the higher salary requirements otherwise businesses will go bankrupted in uk this is something called logic!!!!
attributes.background: You can’t extend the route to Indefinite Leave to Remain to 10 years and simultaneously impose very high salary thresholds for visa renewal. Keeping both requirements in place at the same time makes the system excessively difficult. At least one of these rules needs to be reconsidered or removed.”

rejection.details:
We cannot accept your petition as it is unclear exactly what you are calling for the Government and Parliament to do.

You may wish to start a new petition which outlines the UK visa salary requirements you would like the Government or Parliament to implement.
